text: @kimguilfoyle @BilldeBlasio @ericgarcetti Who knew that Kimberly Guilfoyle would test positive for Covid-19 the day after blasting Democrat Mayors. Maybe she now blast Trump & GOP Governors where Covid is at record highs.
